document_data.mainbody:
aladorn Cassalanters residence was a row house and the home of Caladorn Cassalanter located in Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The home stood three stories tall.
Caladorn Cassalanters residence was located in the west section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward just north of Piergeirons Palace on the the eastern side of Swords Street.
